name: vitreum
description: Web app build system using Browserify and React

scripts.scaffold: npm run setup && cd ../vitreum_test && vitreum init -y
scripts.scaffold:static: npm run setup && cd ../vitreum_test && vitreum init -y --static
scripts.setup_test_proj: cd ../vitreum_test && npm init -y && node ../vitreum/scripts/install_proj_libs.js && npm link vitreum
scripts.setup: npm link && node scripts/install_peer_libs.js && npm run setup_test_proj
